payload.name: narrative-causal-storytelling
payload.core: Build coherent time-ordered explanations connecting events, motives, and causes into a story supporting prediction and action. Integrates causal, abductive, and rhetorical constraints into persuasive explanations.
proc: identify key events: enumerate significant occurrences in sequence
infer motives: attribute intentions to actors
trace causal links: connect events through cause-effect relations
synthesize narrative: weave elements into coherent story

diff.abductive: full narrative arc vs single best explanation

signals: story feels too neat or complete
mitigations: mark confidence levels on causal links

ex.sit: Postmortem: Production outage lasted 4 hours. Need to explain what happened and why.
steps: events: deploy at 14:00, alerts at 14:15, rollback at 18:00
timeline: deploy -> cache miss spike -> DB overload -> cascading failure
motives: team rushed deploy to meet deadline pressure
causal links: new code path bypassed cache -> 10x DB load
narrative: deadline pressure led to skipped load test, revealing cache dependency
ex.insight: narrative exposes systemic cause (deadline pressure) beyond proximate cause (bad code)
